title: Pork belly with fennel salt, potato and celeriac purée and an apple and fennel sauce
description: Fennel and pork belly are a match made in heaven, but this recipe raises the ante by slow roasting the meat for four hours.
ingredients: 2kg/4lb 8oz piece pork belly, boned and rolled, skin scored (your butcher can do this for you)
500ml/18fl oz pork stock( or chicken stock)
1 small head celeriac, peeled and sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
